name: Jelly World (Wanerrrrr_L, hxxxuan)
description:
Welcome to the world of jelly, where you need skills to overcome obstacles. 

The bouncing nature of jelly in this game may annoy you, but sometimes it actually helps!

To get to the end, you have to be patient.

Player Abilities:

  • Move mouse to change camera angle
  • Walking: W, A, S, D/ arrow keys
  • Jumping: Space
  • Crouching: C
  • Push objects
  • Sliding: Left shift
  • Grappling hook: Right mouse button

Moldeling-(mainly) Glori. 

Scene editing-(mainly)Waner. 

Coding-Waner&Glori.
